body_html:
Hi @andydavis1 - yes, apologies if my terminology was incorrect or misleading - I was following OpenCVs terminology which I presumed was standard.

I didn't realize MKL supports this. Thats great news. I am happy to give that a shot. Does Master have working MKL compilation out of the box for Mac OS X? Happy to mark this issue closed and move commentary to #10685 if you feel that is appropriate.

body:
Hi @andydavis1 - yes, apologies if my terminology was incorrect or misleading - I was following OpenCVs terminology which I presumed was standard.

I didn't realize MKL supports this. Thats great news. I am happy to give that a shot. Does Master have working MKL compilation out of the box for Mac OS X? Happy to mark this issue closed and move commentary to #10685 if you feel that is appropriate.
